answers.author: Paul Scher
answers.text:
Though not an exact match for what you were looking for, I would nevertheless direct you to "Traver$ing the Fiscal Crisis," an article by Evelina Moulder and Ron Carlee found in the May 2010 publication of Public Management. It includes a discusion about lessons that can be learned for local goverments with Aaa bond ratings. The article can also be found at icma.org/pm.
